history.proof: intros s z H. unfold not in H. induction s using set_rect. - reflexivity. - simpl. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment s : set d, z : dart H : exds (Is s d) z -> False IHs : (exds s z -> False) -> card (Ds s z) = card s Unable to unify "card (Ds s z) = card s" with "card (if eq_dart_dec d z then Ds s z else Is (Ds s z) d) = (if exds_dec s d then card s else S (card s))".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment s : set d, z : dart H : exds (Is s d) z -> False IHs : (exds s z -> False) -> card (Ds s z) = card s Unable to unify "card (Ds s z) = card s" with "card (if eq_dart_dec d z then Ds s z else Is (Ds s z) d) = (if exds_dec s d then card s else S (card s))".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s

Premises:
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
Ds = fix Ds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : set := match s with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if eq_dart_dec x z then Ds s0 z else Is (Ds s0 z) x end : set -> dart -> set
dart = nat : Set
card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), (card (Ds s z) <= card s)%nat
not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z
not_exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds (Ds s z) z
exds_Ds_exds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> exds s z
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s
exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), x <> z -> exds s z < -> exds (Ds s x) z
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
exds_Ds_diff : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> x <> z
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
set_rec : forall P : set -> Set, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_rect : forall P : set -> Type, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_ind : forall P : set -> Prop, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
top_top_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
bottom_bottom_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
not_exd_A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
not_exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> top m k z = nil
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
not_pred_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> B_1 m k z = m
not_succ_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> B m k z = m
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
not_succ_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k (top m k z)
not_pred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k (bottom m k z)
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_1_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z

``` 
intros s z H.
unfold not in H.
induction s using set_rect.
- reflexivity.
- simpl. destruct (exds_dec s x) as [Hx|Hx].
  + apply IHs.
    intros H_contra; apply H.
    right; assumption.
  + apply IHs.
    intros H_contra; apply H.
    right; assumption.
```

original: intros s z H. unfold not in H. induction s using set_rect. - reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (exds_dec s x) as [Hx|Hx]. + apply IHs. intros H_contra; apply H. right; auto. + apply IHs. intros H_contra; apply H. right; auto.
